<a href="../index.html">Home</a> &gt; <a href="./sandjs.html">@akitain/sandjs</a> &gt; <a href="./sandjs.diverging_palettes.html">DIVERGING\_PALETTES</a>

## DIVERGING\_PALETTES variable

Diverging color palettes for data with a meaningful midpoint. Colors diverge from a neutral center to two extremes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
DIVERGING_PALETTES: {
    readonly redBlue: readonly ["#b91c1c", "#dc2626", "#ef4444", "#f87171", "#fca5a5", "#e5e7eb", "#93c5fd", "#60a5fa", "#3b82f6", "#2563eb", "#1d4ed8"];
    readonly orangePurple: readonly ["#c2410c", "#ea580c", "#f97316", "#fb923c", "#fdba74", "#e5e7eb", "#d8b4fe", "#c084fc", "#a855f7", "#9333ea", "#7e22ce"];
    readonly greenRed: readonly ["#15803d", "#16a34a", "#22c55e", "#4ade80", "#86efac", "#e5e7eb", "#fca5a5", "#f87171", "#ef4444", "#dc2626", "#b91c1c"];
}
```
